title: ReneVerkaart
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015181642/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015181642/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Rene Verkaart**

Rene Verkaart started [CharactersFontFoundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015181642/http:/typophile.com/wiki/CharactersFontFoundry) in 2004 as the result of a decade of custom logo- and typedesign for clients. Since 1995 he's been running his own graphic design studio, [Stoere Binken Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015181642/http:/www.stoerebinken.nl/), with a friend. Most of his early typefaces were custom designed for clients.

Most of his typefaces originate in his holidays. "Visiting new places in the world is a big inspiration for creating new typefaces", he says.

All his typefaces are extensively tested by carefully selected _BetaTesters_. This are renowned graphic designers or design studios that _TestDrive_ the typefaces in practice and give critical feedback to improve the final release versions.  
Currently Characters Font Foundry is working with the following _BetaTesters_: [Magnus Holder Bjørk at Magnusland](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015181642/http:/www.magnusland.com/), [Vicente Arregui at Biplazadesign](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015181642/http:/www.biplaza.com/) and [Dennis van Eikenhorst at Ontwerpbureau B2B](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015181642/http:/www.ontwerpbureaub2b.nl/).

His typefaces are featured in magazines like _Items (Netherlands)_ and _Diseno (Spain)_.

Rene Verkaart is co-founder of [Stoere Binken Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015181642/http:/www.stoerebinken.nl/), a renowned Dutch graphic design studio based in Maastricht, The Netherlands.
